game.name: Run the Backrooms
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run the Backrooms is a cooperative horror game that supports up to 6 players. The game has several levels and entities that will certainly make your gameplay very exciting. The game has free updates, always bringing new game levels and bug fixes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run the Backrooms is a cooperative horror game that supports up to 6 players. The game has several levels and entities that will certainly make your gameplay very exciting. The game has free updates, always bringing new game levels and bug fixes.
